movies.title: Sikandar
movies.cast: Salman Khan, Rashmika Mandanna, Kajal Aggarwal, Sharman Joshi, Sathyaraj, Prateik Babbar, Sanjay Kapoor, Jatin Sarna, Anjini Dhawan, Ayan Khan
movies.crew: A. R. Murugadoss (Director, Writer), Sajid Nadiadwala (Producer), Pritam (Music Composer), Santhosh Narayanan (Background Score), Tirru (Cinematography), Vivek Harshan (Editor)
movies.plot: Sikandar is a Hindi action drama directed by A. R. Murugadoss. The film follows Sanjay 'Sikandar' Rajkot, a man driven by a tragic accident to redeem his past by impacting the lives of three individuals. His journey pits him against a vengeful politician, blending intense action, emotional depth, and a social message. The narrative explores themes of redemption and justice, though it has been critiqued for a weak script despite strong action sequences.

movies.title: Bhul Chuk Maaf
movies.crew: Vishal Bhardwaj (Director), Vishal Bhardwaj (Producer), Rekha Bhardwaj (Producer), Gulzar (Writer), Mitesh Shah (Writer), Vishal Bhardwaj (Music), Saurabh Goswami (Cinematography), A. Sreekar Prasad (Editor)
movies.plot: Bhul Chuk Maaf is a Hindi romantic comedy drama directed by Vishal Bhardwaj. The film follows a man trapped in a time loop the day before his wedding, forced to relive the same day repeatedly. As he navigates the loop, he uncovers deeper truths about his relationships and himself, blending humor, romance, and emotional depth.

movies.title: The Diplomat
movies.cast: John Abraham, Sadia Khateeb, Kumud Mishra, Revathy, Sharib Hashmi
movies.crew: Shivam Nair (Director), Ritesh Shah (Writer), Information not available (Producer, Music, Cinematography, Editor)
movies.plot: The Diplomat is a gripping Hindi political thriller based on the true rescue mission of Uzma Ahmed from Pakistan, showcasing a diplomat’s high-stakes journey.

movies.title: Costao
movies.cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Sanjay Mishra, Information not available

movies.plot: Costao is a biographical crime drama about Costao Fernandes, a fearless 1990s Goa customs officer battling a gold smuggling syndicate, lauded for Nawazuddin’s performance.

movies.title: Jewel Thief
movies.cast: Saif Ali Khan, Jaideep Ahlawat, Kunal Khemu
movies.crew: Siddharth Anand (Director), Information not available (Producer, Music, Cinematography, Editor)
movies.plot: Jewel Thief is a slick Hindi crime thriller following a master con artist’s audacious plan to steal the African Red Sun diamond, packed with suspense.

movies.title: Chhaava
movies.cast: Vicky Kaushal, Rashmika Mandanna, Akshaye Khanna, Ashutosh Rana, Divya Dutta
movies.crew: Laxman Utekar (Director), Dinesh Vijan (Producer), A. R. Rahman (Music), Information not available (Cinematography, Editor)
movies.plot: Chhaava is a Hindi historical drama depicting Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj’s heroic battles against the Mughals, celebrated for Vicky Kaushal’s intense portrayal.

movies.title: Chhorii 2
movies.cast: Nushrratt Bharuccha, Saurabh Goyal, Soha Ali Khan, Pallavi Patil, Gashmeer Mahajani
movies.crew: Vishal Furia (Director), Information not available (Producer, Music, Cinematography, Editor)
movies.plot: Chhorii 2 is a chilling Hindi horror drama about a mother’s fight to save her daughter from ancient superstitions and modern evils, gripping audiences.

movies.title: Be Happy
movies.cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Nora Fatehi, Johny Lever
movies.crew: Remo D’Souza (Director), Information not available (Producer, Music, Cinematography, Editor)
movies.plot: Be Happy is a heartwarming Hindi drama about a single father and his daughter’s dream to shine in a dance reality show, resonating with viewers.

movies.plot: Nadaaniyan is a vibrant Hindi romantic comedy about young lovers navigating love and societal pressures in a bustling city, popular for its fresh pairing.

movies.title: Housefull 5

movies.plot: Housefull 5 is a chaotic Hindi comedy filled with mistaken identities and hilarious mishaps, continuing the franchise’s legacy with a star-studded cast.

movies.title: Black Warrant

movies.plot: Black Warrant is a gritty Hindi crime drama exploring the underworld of crime and justice, noted for its compelling narrative and strong performances.
